mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (board_category_id, writer, title, content, reg_date, price, deadline, isAuction, isLend, interestCnt, hits, returnDate, item_name, item_image1, item_image2, item_image3, item_category_id, latitude, longitude, isMegaphone) VALUES (#{board_category_id}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{price}, #{deadline}, #{isAuction}, #{isLend}, #{interestCnt}, #{hits}, #{returnDate}, #{item_name}, #{item_image1}, #{item_image2}, #{item_image3}, #{item_category_id}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{isMegaphone})
